about_the_game:
Urashima Sakata Fun Shima x SPY RUMBLE Collaboration!


The zombie pirate Shima, in pursuit of hidden treasures, is now available as a cute marshmallow skin in the SPY RUMBLE world!
When you start the game wearing the collaboration skin, the commander's voice will change to an exclusive voice that contains 4 patterns of Shima's brave dialogue as a zombie pirate, all newly recorded!

In addition, the key visual of Shima the Zombie Pirate, a voice video, and a smartphone wallpaper of Shima in marshmallow form are also included as a special bonus for purchasers!

  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000; Intel Iris Pro 5200
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
